title: Matt Striker
summary: Matthew Kaye[2] (born June 26, 1974)[1] is an American professional wrestler, professional wrestling commentator, actor and former high school teacher, using the ring name Matt Striker. He is working with Impact Wrestling as a commentator, as well as providing English commentary for Lucha Libre AAA World Wide (AAA) pay-per-view (PPV) events in Mexico. He also wrestles on the United States independent circuit. He is best known for his time in WWE as both a wrestler and commentator.  He is currently a part owner of one of the largest real estate companies on Long Island with a focus on the purchase and development of commercial properties.
